TEXT: Oh no! Some #pvandal has scribbled all over this biome! The description now reads: NL NL "All enemies are #rdebuffed in new and #rdangeresque ways. NL Upon entry, obtain a carded #grare #grelic [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL Author: The Ooik [REMOVE_SPACE]" NL NL It sounds like combats in this area will be #geasier than usual, so... what's the catch?
